media:group.media:title: Initial Configuration
media:group.media:description:
In this video you'll learn everything you need to know when running Ardour 5 for the first time.

How to go through the first run wizard?
How to configure your audio interface?
How to create your first Ardour session?

Learn more in the Ardour Manual:
http://manual.ardour.org/ardour-configuration/

Get Ardour:
http://ardour.org

Check out unfa's channel:
http://youtube.com/unfa000

You can also watch on PeerTube:
https://pe.ertu.be/videos/watch/225768a9-8bba-469b-8f74-fa569177ad74
